Job Description: If you are someone who is always contemplating new & unusual ways of to optimize user experience, how technologies can interact, and how various tools, technologies & concepts can help a customer drive analyse data, then Wegarner is the place for youRequired Candidate profileMust Have : avascript/Typescript(Angular/React/Vue), NodeJS, Mongodb/PostgreSQL/MySQL/SQL Server or any other RDBMS /NoSQL  Good to have :Amazon Web Services (AWS) - S3, EC2, Lambda, SQS, SES ,Linux
